name: oc-request
description: OC-request is vanilla-js based replacement for standard OctoberCMS api. No dependencies. Based on native XMLHttpRequest.

scripts.postinstall: node -e "console.log('\u001b[35m\u001b[1mDo you like oc-request?. Support my work as a STAR on github:\u001b[22m\u001b[39m\n > \u001b[32mhttps://github.com/ambrazhei/oc-request\u001b[0m\n')"

author: Uladzimir Ambrazhei
